front.title: A YANG Data Model for Layer-2 Network Topologies

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model for Layer 2 network topologies. Editorial Note (To be removed by RFC Editor) Please update these statements within the document with the RFC number to be assigned to this document: o "This version of this YANG module is part of RFC XXXX;" o "RFC XXXX: A YANG Data Model for Layer-2 Network Topologies"; o reference: RFC XXXX Please update the "revision" date of the YANG module.
